metadata.Title: CVE-2021-0089 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: Observable response discrepancy in some Intel(R) Processors may allow an authorized user to potentially enable information disclosure via local access.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> hypervisor packages are in universe. For issues in the hypervisor, add appropriate tags to each section, ex: Tags_xen: universe-binary

criterions.comment: xen package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
